00010 # define DEBUG 0

00012 void initQUESTEnv(QUESTEnv *env){
00013         // init MPI environment
00014         int rank, numRanks, initialized;
00015         MPI_Initialized(&initialized);
00016         if (!initialized){
00017                 MPI_Init(NULL, NULL);
00018                 MPI_Comm_size(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &numRanks);
00019                 MPI_Comm_rank(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &rank);
00020 
00021                 if (DEBUG) {
00022                         char hostName[256];
00023                         int hostNameLen;
00024                         MPI_Get_processor_name(hostName, &hostNameLen);
00025                         printf("rank %d on host %s\n", rank, hostName);
00026                 }
00027                 env->rank=rank;
00028                 env->numRanks=numRanks;
00029         } else printf("ERROR: Trying to initialize QUESTEnv multiple times. Ignoring\n");
00030 }
00031 
00032 void syncQUESTEnv(QUESTEnv env){
00033         MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00034 }
00035 
00036 void closeQUESTEnv(QUESTEnv env){
00037         int finalized;
00038         MPI_Finalized(&finalized);
00039         if (!finalized) MPI_Finalize();
00040         else printf("ERROR: Trying to close QUESTEnv multiple times. Ignoring\n");
00041 }

00054 int isChunkToSkipInFindPZero(int chunkId, int chunkSize, int measureQubit){
00055         long long int sizeHalfBlock = 1LL << (measureQubit);
00056         int numChunksToSkip = sizeHalfBlock/chunkSize;
00057         // calculate probability by summing over numChunksToSkip, then skipping numChunksToSkip, etc
00058         int bitToCheck = chunkId & numChunksToSkip;
00059         return bitToCheck;
00060 }
00061 
00062 // ==================================================================== //
00063 //                                                                      //
00064 //     calcTotalProbability -- calculate total probability over all     //
00065 //                      ranks by taking the norm of the state vector.   //
00066 //                      Should be equal to one.                         // 
00067 //                                                                      //
00068 //     input:                                                           //
00069 //                    rank -- mpi proc id                               // 
00070 //                    numAmpsPerRank  -- number of amps on one rank     //
00071 //                    numRanks -- num mpi processes                     //
00072 //                    stateVecReal, -- real/imag parts of               //
00073 //                    stateVecImag     the state vector                 //
00074 //                                                                      //
00075 //     output:                                                          //
00076 //                    double -- total probability                       //
00077 //                                                                      //
00078 // ==================================================================== //
00079 
00080 
00081 double calcTotalProbability(MultiQubit multiQubit){
00082         double pTotal=0; 
00083         double allRankTotals=0;
00084         long long int index;
00085         long long int numAmpsPerRank = multiQubit.numAmps;
00086         for (index=0; index<numAmpsPerRank; index++){ 
00087                 pTotal+=multiQubit.stateVec.real[index]*multiQubit.stateVec.real[index];      
00088                 pTotal+=multiQubit.stateVec.imag[index]*multiQubit.stateVec.imag[index];      
00089         } 
00090         if (DEBUG) printf("before calc prob. %d\n", multiQubit.numChunks);
00091         if (multiQubit.numChunks>1) MPI_Reduce(&pTotal, &allRankTotals, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00092         else allRankTotals=pTotal;
00093 
00094         return allRankTotals;
00095 }
00096 
00106 int chunkIsUpper(int chunkId, int chunkSize, int rotQubit)
00107 {       
00108         long long int sizeHalfBlock = 1LL << (rotQubit);
00109         long long int sizeBlock = sizeHalfBlock*2;
00110         long long int posInBlock = (chunkId*chunkSize) % sizeBlock;
00111         return posInBlock<sizeHalfBlock;
00112 }
00113 
00127 void getRotAngle(int chunkIsUpper, Complex *rot1, Complex *rot2, Complex alpha, Complex beta)
00128 {
00129         if (chunkIsUpper){
00130                 *rot1=alpha;
00131                 rot2->real=-beta.real;
00132                 rot2->imag=-beta.imag;
00133         } else {
00134                 *rot1=beta;
00135                 *rot2=alpha;
00136         }
00137 }
00148 int getChunkPairId(int chunkIsUpper, int chunkId, int chunkSize, int rotQubit)
00149 {
00150         long long int sizeHalfBlock = 1LL << (rotQubit);
00151         int chunksPerHalfBlock = sizeHalfBlock/chunkSize;
00152         if (chunkIsUpper){
00153                 return chunkId + chunksPerHalfBlock;
00154         } else {
00155                 return chunkId - chunksPerHalfBlock;
00156         }
00157 }
00158 
00167 int halfMatrixBlockFitsInChunk(int chunkSize, int rotQubit)
00168 {
00169         long long int sizeHalfBlock = 1LL << (rotQubit);
00170         if (chunkSize > sizeHalfBlock) return 1;
00171         else return 0;
00172 }
00173 // ==================================================================== 
00174 // rotateQubit: 
00175 // inputs:
00176 //      numAmpsPerRank -- number of amps in mpi proc
00177 //      numQubits -- number of qubits                     
00178 //      rotQubit -- qubit being rotated 
00179 //      aRe,    -- real/imag part of                
00180 //      aIm        rotation angle alpha             
00181 //      bRe,     -- real/imag part of                
00182 //      bIm         rotation angle beta              
00183 //
00184 // temp:
00185 //      stateVecRealPair, -- real/imag parts of the state vector offset by half a block
00186 //      stateVecImagPair     from the state vector updated on this rank, used to update
00187 //                           this rank's state vector
00188 //
00189 // outputs:
00190 //      stateVecReal, -- real/imag parts of               
00191 //      stateVecImag     the state vector updated on this rank                 
00192 // ==================================================================== 
00193 
00194 void rotateQubit(MultiQubit multiQubit, const int rotQubit, Complex alpha, Complex beta)
00195 
00196 {
00197         // flag to require memory exchange. 1: an entire block fits on one rank, 0: at most half a block fits on one rank
00198         int useLocalDataOnly = halfMatrixBlockFitsInChunk(multiQubit.numAmps, rotQubit);
00199         Complex rot1, rot2;
00200 
00201         // rank's chunk is in upper half of block 
00202         int rankIsUpper;
00203         int pairRank; // rank of corresponding chunk
00204 
00205         // MPI send/receive vars
00206         int TAG=100;
00207         MPI_Status status;
00208 
00209         double *stateVecReal, stateVecImag, stateVecRealPair, stateVecImagPair;
00210         
00211 
00212         if (useLocalDataOnly){
00213                 // all values required to update state vector lie in this rank
00214                 rotateQubitLocal(multiQubit, rotQubit, alpha, beta);
00215         } else {
00216                 // need to get corresponding chunk of state vector from other rank
00217                 rankIsUpper = chunkIsUpper(multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, rotQubit);
00218                 getRotAngle(rankIsUpper, &rot1, &rot2, alpha, beta);
00219                 pairRank = getChunkPairId(rankIsUpper, multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, rotQubit);
00220                 //printf("%d rank has pair rank: %d\n", multiQubit.rank, pairRank);
00221                 // get corresponding values from my pair
00222                 MPI_Sendrecv(multiQubit.stateVec.real, multiQubit.numAmps, MPI_DOUBLE, pairRank, TAG,
00223                                  multiQubit.pairStateVec.real, multiQubit.numAmps, MPI_DOUBLE, pairRank, TAG,
00224                                  MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00225                 //printf("rank: %d err: %d\n", multiQubit.rank, err);
00226                 MPI_Sendrecv(multiQubit.stateVec.imag, multiQubit.numAmps, MPI_DOUBLE, pairRank, TAG,
00227                                 multiQubit.pairStateVec.imag, multiQubit.numAmps, MPI_DOUBLE, pairRank, TAG,
00228                                 MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00229                 // this rank's values are either in the upper of lower half of the block. send values to rotateQubitDistributed
00230                 // in the correct order
00231                 if (rankIsUpper){
00232                         rotateQubitDistributed(multiQubit,rotQubit,rot1,rot2,
00233                                 multiQubit.stateVec, //upper
00234                                 multiQubit.pairStateVec, //lower
00235                                 multiQubit.stateVec); //output
00236                 } else {
00237                         rotateQubitDistributed(multiQubit,rotQubit,rot1,rot2,
00238                                 multiQubit.pairStateVec, //upper
00239                                 multiQubit.stateVec, //lower
00240                                 multiQubit.stateVec); //output
00241                 }
00242         }
00243 }
00244 
00245 // ==================================================================== 
00246 // findProbabilityOfZero: 
00247 // inputs:
00248 //      rank -- mpi proc id                              
00249 //      numAmpsPerRank -- number of amps in mpi proc
00250 //      numQubits -- number of qubits                     
00251 //      measureQubit -- qubit being measured
00252 //      stateVecReal, -- real/imag parts of               
00253 //      stateVecImag     the state vector updated on this rank                 
00254 // ==================================================================== 
00255 
00256 
00257 double findProbabilityOfZero(MultiQubit multiQubit,
00258                 const int measureQubit)
00259 {
00260         double stateProb=0, totalStateProb=0;
00261         int skipValuesWithinRank = halfMatrixBlockFitsInChunk(multiQubit.numAmps, measureQubit);
00262         if (skipValuesWithinRank) {
00263                 stateProb = findProbabilityOfZeroLocal(multiQubit, measureQubit);
00264         } else {
00265                 if (!isChunkToSkipInFindPZero(multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, measureQubit)){
00266                         stateProb = findProbabilityOfZeroDistributed(multiQubit, measureQubit);
00267                 } else stateProb = 0;
00268         }
00269         MPI_Reduce(&stateProb, &totalStateProb, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00270         return totalStateProb;
00271 }
